title: Average ticket price New York Knicks ( NBA ) games 2015/16
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: In general Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2006/07 to 2009/10, gradually increasing from 2009/10 to 2011/12, and finally roughly constant from 2011/12 to 2013/14.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010/11 and 2011/12.
The highest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 129.38 was reached at Year 2013/14
The lowest Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, of value 68.04 was reported at Year 2009/10
